name: Chef Ahmed
description: Chef Ahmed is a renowned chef in Bangladesh, known for his expertise in traditional Bengali cuisine. With over 15 years of experience in the culinary industry, he has honed his skills to perfection and is a favorite among foodies all over the country.

recipes.name: Fish Curry
recipes.cookingMethod: Saute onions, add tomatoes and spices, then add fish and cook on medium heat for 20-25 mins.

recipes.name: Vegetable Biryani
recipes.cookingMethod: Boil rice and set aside. Saute vegetables, add spices and yogurt, then add rice and cook on low heat for 30 mins.

recipes.name: Mutton Korma
recipes.cookingMethod: Saute onions, add tomatoes and spices, then add mutton and yogurt and cook on low heat for 2 hours.

name: Chef Farzana
description: Chef Farzana is a rising star in the culinary world, known for her innovative recipes and unique flavor combinations. With 10 years of experience in the industry, she has already made a name for herself as one of the most exciting chefs in Bangladesh.

recipes.name: Chicken Biryani
recipes.cookingMethod: Boil rice and set aside. Saute onions, add chicken and spices, then add rice and cook on low heat for 30 mins.

recipes.name: Beef Kabab
recipes.cookingMethod: Mix all ingredients, shape into kababs, and grill on medium heat for 10-12 mins on each side.

recipes.name: Lemon Chicken
recipes.cookingMethod: Marinate chicken in lemon juice and spices for 30 mins. Saute in olive oil until cooked through.

name: Chef Ayesha
description: Chef Ayesha is a young and talented chef who has already made a name for herself in the competitive world of Bangladeshi cuisine. Her recipes are known for their bold flavors and creative twists on traditional dishes.

recipes.name: Beef Kabab
recipes.cookingMethod: Mix all ingredients, shape into kababs, and grill on medium heat for 10-12 mins on each side.

recipes.name: Mutton Korma
recipes.cookingMethod: Saute onions, add tomatoes and spices, then add mutton and yogurt and cook on low heat for 2 hours.

recipes.name: Chicken Korma
recipes.cookingMethod: In a large bowl, mix together the yogurt, onion, garlic, ginger, and spicesAdd the chicken and stir to coat.Heat some oil in a large pan or pot over medium-high heat.Add the chicken and marinade and cook for about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

recipes.name: Vegetable Biryani
recipes.cookingMethod: Boil rice and set aside. Saute vegetables, add spices and yogurt, then add rice and cook on low heat for 30 mins.

name: Chef Kamal
description: Chef Kamal is a veteran of the culinary industry, with over 20 years of experience in some of the top restaurants in Bangladesh. He is known for his traditional cooking techniques and his commitment to using only the freshest, locally-sourced ingredients.

recipes.name: Beef Bhuna
recipes.cookingMethod:

2. Fry the onions until golden brown. Add the ginger, garlic, and green chilies and fry for a minute. Add the beef and fry until it changes color.Cook until the beef is tender and the gravy thickens.

recipes.name: Chicken Biryani
recipes.cookingMethod: Heat oil in a pan and fry the onions until golden brown.Add the ginger, garlic, and green chilies and fry for a minute. Add the chicken and fry until it changes color.Add the tomatoes, cumin powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder, chili powder, and salt. Cover and cook on low heat for 15 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Chef Tarek
description: Chef Tarek is a master of fusion cuisine, combining the flavors and techniques of Bangladeshi cooking with international ingredients and cooking styles. With 18 years of experience in the industry, he has developed a unique and delicious culinary style that has won him many fans.
